about_the_game:
Stage Break Idle is a relaxing incremental game about beating each stage. Boost your damage through upgrade. Discover different features and upgrades as you progress. Unlock companion to aid you in battle until you beat the final stage!

Key Features

Although you wouldn't die to the enemy, The enemy grows increasingly stronger with each stage which mean you could get stuck. Strategize and optimize your approach to beat them, make progress and discover different features and upgrades.

Discover how different features and upgrades work with each other as you progress. Talent system could turn certain element into damage source while Magic system could not only deal damage but speed up your progress.

Offers a relaxing gameplay experience with minimal input. Simply buy upgrades, leave the game running, and return later to find plenty of resources to spend. Earn resources even while offline, allowing you to progress effortlessly at your own pace.

Features

  • Incremental gameplay, number goes up because you make it to

  • Over 80 upgrades, skill and magic to uncover

  • Reborn anytime to get stronger or reassign the resources

  • Play however you want, whether it is active play or idle

  • Clean and easy-to-navigate UI

  • Definite ending

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel & AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most device built in the last 5+ years should run this game just fine

short_description: Stage Break Idle is a relaxing incremental game where you defeat enemies at each stage. As you progress, you'll discover meaningful upgrades and unlock engaging new features. Unlock powerful companions to aid you in battle, and continue advancing until you conquer the final stage.
